name: Adelaide (Cod3DBF)
description:
Find the 5 Terminals spread across the world and deactivate them to escape. Each Terminal will alert the pursuers of your actions and if not careful to dodge and evade, the game will end. 

Keyboard Controls

Movement: "W A S D"  to walk and holding "Shift" to run

Mouse: Left click Terminals to interact with and shut down. 

Follow on Social Media on Instagram @dakodablueleader for game updates and cat pictures.
